name: stooge
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is forced or paid by someone in authority to do an unpleasant or secret job for them: The newly appointed mayor is widely regarded as a government stooge.
an actor in a funny show in the theatre or on television whose job is to allow the main actor to make him or her look silly
